title: Becoming the Beast
description: A werewolf story, dealing with insanity, lycanthropy and the repercussions of both."When darkness falls all will cower in their homes. They will seek a place to hide away from my gaze. Every sound will be a pin prick to their psyche. Every shadow will be something wicked prepared to devour them. They will run as to escape the inevitable. They will pray to the powers that be for deliverance,but they shall have none." Contains:Part I: BecomingPart II: The Beast
author: S.G. Bynum
